title: Input Validation and Output Formatting
description: Create a program that takes a user's name and age as input and outputs a greeting message with the user's name and their age in a specific format. The program should also include input validation to ensure the user's age is within a valid range (1-120 years). If the age is not valid, the program should prompt the user to re-enter their age until a valid age is provided.
sample_output: Hello, John Doe! You are 25 years old.
